title: Former Game Informer Editors Join Us! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 07.08.22
description:
Blessing is joined by Wesley Leblanc and Jon Carson formerly of Game Informer to talk about the layoffs, Skull and Bones, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:10:30 - Housekeeping
A new PS I Love You XOXO is up right now. It is me, Greg, and Janet talking God of War Ragnarok. You can catch that right now on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames and on Podcast services around the globe.
Shout-out to Prime Gaming for sponsoring our streams. To celebrate Prime Day you can start Freeloading Over 30 Games With Prime Gaming for Prime Day 2022! And then you’ll also be able to claim additional games on Prime Day - July 12 and July 13, which will include AAA titles like Mass Effect Legendary Edition, GRID Legends, Need for Speed Heat, and Star Wars Jedi Knight - Jedi Academy, Star Wars Jedi Knight II - Jedi Outcast, and Star Wars Republic Commando. So check out the link in the description to start Freeloading games now!
HEY LA, wanna hang out with Greg, Joey, and SnowBikeMike?! Xbox and Kinda Funny will be taking over the Fonda Theater in Los Angeles for the As Dusk Falls Launch Event!. A live We Have Cool Friends! A Kinda Funny Gamescast! A Live Let’s Play! Wanna come?! kindafunny.com/xbox for all the details!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: FargoBrady,Gordon McGuire, & Al Tribesman
The Roper Report  -
00:11:23 - GameStop Fires Game Informer Staff As It Doubles Down On NFTs And The Blockchain - Paul Tassi @ Forbes
00:27:40 - Ad
00:29:35 - Skull and Bones has a release date - Matt Kim @ IGN
00:42:35 - Pokemon Puzzle League comes to the Nintendo Switch
00:45:15 - Some of July’s PlayStation Plus Extra and Premium games may have leaked - Tom Ivan @ VGC
00:49:45 - RoboCop: Rogue City has shown off its first gameplay - Joe Skrebels @ IGN
00:54:00 - Out today
00:55:56 - You‘re Wrong
Next Week’s Hosts:
MON: Bless and Tim
TUES: Bless and Gary
WED: Bless and Janet
THURS: Greg and Tim
FRI: Tam and Lucy
